## InlineEditSelectionProvider interface

Service that exposes inline edit info

<b>Signature:</b>


## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [selectedCell$](./edit-api.inlineeditselectionprovider.selectedcell_.md) | <code>Observable&lt;string &#124; undefined&gt;</code> | Captures the currently selected cell. The return value is either just an ID or <code>ID#accessor</code>. If a cell is deselected, the service returns i |
